meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Matt Nordsten Heather Goodlett Ashley Anderson Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4478.

td.p: Matt Nordsten, a junior from Altadena, California
Heather Goodlett, a sophomore from Hanceville, Alabama
Ashley Anderson, a junior from Arlington, Texas

tr.td: UNUSUAL PLANTS
PROFESSIONAL SPORTS
RIVER COUNTRY
THE MALL
OPERAS YOU'LL LIKE
"O" YEAH, SURE

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_DJ_3_5', 'clue_DJ_3_5_stuck', '(Ashley: Who is Buckminster?)
(Alex: I need more than that.)
(Ashley: [No response])
(Alex: Oo, sorry. Matt?)
(Matt: Who is Bucksminister Fuller?)
(Alex: No.)
...
(Alex: You added an "S" there, Matt, and it cost you. You said "Bucksminister" instead of [*], that\'s the man\'s name. Heather, we come back to you.)

Buckminster Fuller

AshleyMatt
Triple Stumper
')
